section.title: What is AppStream?
section.para: AppStream is a cross-distro effort for building Software-Center applications. It provides specifications for things like a screenshot-service, application ratings & reviews etc. It also provides a Xapian database, storing information about all available applications in the distributionâ€™s repositories.

All AppStream components are distro-agnostic (with exception to some metadata which is used to generate the Xapian application cache), and therefore AppStream makes it possible to build distro-agnostic application management tools.
